Text:
this file contains adware it will try to contact the primawega.com website and add a program called loudmo

this will disturb your browsing pleasures on both IE and Firefox and give you wonderful ads :B.

ESET NOD32 blocks the program's ability to phone home. However if you have installed it then all you have to do is 

Go into Control Panel > Add Remove Programs.

Remove "LoudMo Contextual Ad Assistant".

if you want more info you can allways google primawega adn maybe read this http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=38&t=1726795&start=0
yeah!!! some adware, but error code -5001: 0x80070002 in setup.exe, anyone?

A piece of crap. Don't waste your time downloading it. I searched the internet for a solution for the -5001 error for several days. I found the error reported in many places, but with no working solution.
A much better torrent is http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5346628/BioShock_2-Razor1911
Norman is the worst antivirus for downloading pirated games !
